########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND Hybrid_Comm_sources
    macros_functions.cc
    Add_Header_impl.cc
    Hysteresis_Gate_impl.cc
    Rx_Parallel_Switch_impl.cc
    Rx_Hard_Switch_impl.cc
    Rx_Soft_Switch_impl.cc
    Signal_Quality_Metre_impl.cc
    Source_BV_impl.cc
    Step_Gate_impl.cc
    Tx_Parallel_Switch_impl.cc
    Remove_Header_impl.cc
    Stream_Aligner_impl.cc
    Link_Tester_impl.cc
    Slicer_impl.cc
    Tx_Hard_Switch_impl.cc
    Tx_Soft_Switch_impl.cc )

set(Hybrid_Comm_sources "${Hybrid_Comm_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT Hybrid_Comm_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT Hybrid_Comm_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm SHARED ${Hybrid_Comm_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_Hybrid_Comm_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_Hybrid_Comm_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-Hybrid_Comm)

if(NOT test_Hybrid_Comm_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_Hybrid_Comm_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_Hybrid_Comm_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("Hybrid_Comm_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
